name: Mad Mind Studios
tagline: Take Your Business To The World
description:
My name is Omid Mousaei and I am the founder of Mad Mind Studios. Mad Mind Studios is a Los Angeles Logo Design and Website Design Studio, which specializes in graphic design, as well as services ranging from, but not limited to; logo design, print design, web design, branding, typography, advertising & more.
I am self-employed (full-time) as a graphic designer in Los Angeles, specializing in the fields of corporate identity logo design, print design, web design, and branding with the majority of my time spent designing and implementing marketing promotions for small businesses such as logos, websites, letterhead, business cards, flyers and more. My clients include small business operations, non profit organizations, large corporations, retail shop owners, insurance agents and healthcare providers. With my vast experience in a variety of industries, you can be confident that I design whatever your business demands.
